title: Join the Archives Portal Europe Team
content: Archives Portal Europe is looking for talented professionals to fill five exciting short-term positions!
creator: Antonia Bobik
sourceDescription: Join us on a journey through time

title: On the Ground at the 3D-4CH Winter School 2026
content: TMO joined on-site at the Art & History Museum in Brussels, where participants from across Europe gathered for the first 3D-4CH Winter School. Over three days, heritage professionals came together to explore the transformative potential of 3D technologies in museums and cultural heritage, from cutting-edge digitisation techniques to immersive XR storytelling. We witnessed participants dive […]
creator: Antonia Bobik
sourceDescription: Join us on a journey through time

title: Rediscovering İzmir’s Historic Hans
content: The İzmir Time Machine is bringing the city’s historic han buildings back into public memory through digital reconstruction and an interactive mapping platform.
creator: Antonia Bobik
sourceDescription: Join us on a journey through time

title: Building an Open-Source Strategy for the Semantic Web
content: We are pleased to share an upcoming article by La Tempesta, “Building an Open Source Strategy for the Semantic Web”, to be published on 3 February on the La Tempesta blog.
creator: Antonia Bobik
sourceDescription: Join us on a journey through time

title: New Master Programs at Universität Hamburg
content: The portfolio includes programs in the humanities, social sciences, communication, and informatics, as well as several English-taught and international master’s degrees.
creator: Antonia Bobik
sourceDescription: Join us on a journey through time

title: Examination of Nominations for the Urgent Safeguarding List (2025)
content: The Intergovernmental Committee for the Safeguarding of the Intangible Cultural Heritage examines nominations for possible inscription on the List of Intangible Cultural Heritage in Need of Urgent Safeguarding.
creator: Antonia Bobik
sourceDescription: Join us on a journey through time

title: Three Grant Opportunities Supporting Archives, Research, and Creativity
content: The 2026 APE Grants are now open!
creator: Antonia Bobik
sourceDescription: Join us on a journey through time

title: Opening Up Castle History Through Digital Humanities
content: Hohensalzburg Digital is a Digital Humanities project realized at the University of Salzburg that exemplifies how digital methods can transform the way we access, understand, and connect cultural heritage.
creator: Antonia Bobik
sourceDescription: Join us on a journey through time

title: INFINITY Project Kick-off Meeting in Bologna
content: We are pleased to announce Time Machine Organisation’s participation in the INFINITY project, a major European initiative dedicated to advancing innovation and collaboration within the cultural heritage sector. INFINITY contributes to the European Collaborative Cloud for Cultural Heritage (ECCCH) by developing tools and methods that improve the lifecycle management and ethical reuse of Cultural Heritage […]
creator: Antonia Bobik
sourceDescription: Join us on a journey through time

title: ECHOES / ECCCH Second Call
content: This cascading grants call aims to support initiatives that strengthen collaboration, skills development, and community building within the European cultural heritage ecosystem.
creator: Antonia Bobik
sourceDescription: Join us on a journey through time

title: 3D Digitisation: Prepare for Success
content: This new training opportunity represents an important step in building capacity across Europe’s cultural heritage sector and supporting the effective use of 3D technologies in the digital realm.
creator: Antonia Bobik
sourceDescription: Join us on a journey through time

title: Unlock 3D Potential with 3DBigDataSpace Training at the Hunt Museum
content: The Hunt Museum is thrilled to offer a practical, inclusive 3D‑training series under 3DBigDataSpace designed to help cultural heritage professionals take the leap into 3D digitisation, modelling, fabrication and accessible display.
creator: Antonia Bobik
